title: Fifty Shades Of Black: An Erotic Romance
description: Sultry, seductive, enticing - black is always in style.Marcus Black is as good looking as Hill Harper, has the abs of Shemar Moore and the sensual smile of Blair Underwood. Cherilyn Johnson can't help but drool over him every day at work, but he's her boss and very off limits. At a bachelorette party in Las Vegas she spots Marcus staying at the same hotel and wonders if Marcus is game for a wild weekend? Would she herself be willing to cross that line and risk her career?Will what happens in Vegas stay in Vegas?So begins this scorching romance, but tension mounts when Cherilyn gets a promotion at work. This sensual, steamy romance begs the question: can a strong woman have it all? The job and the man? Follow the quest for love from Pittsburgh to Las Vegas to Myrtle Beach. Hot, tantalizing writing, another excellent romance novel from author Sierra Darcey.Show more Show less --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
author: Sierra Darcey
